org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.time

Interface AdvanceableTime

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GridTime
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EventDrivenGridTime

    interface AdvanceableTime
extends GridTime
    Defines a method for advancing simulation time. Using implementations of this interface means the increase of time can be controlled.

    Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

    Since:
    JDK1.4

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void advanceTime(long time)
      Advances time by time ms.

        getDate, getHours, getMinutes, getRunningTimeMillis, getSeconds, getTimeMillis, gtJoin, gtNotify, gtSleep, gtWait, gtWait, roundedTimeOfDay, start, stop, toString

    • Method Detail

      • advanceTime

        void advanceTime(long time)
        Advances time by time ms.
        Parameters:
        time - The number of ms by which to advance time.
